text: I'm at a point in my life where I have something solid now. I'm a peaceful person, and I want to be surrounded by peace no matter what I'm doing.
author: Cheryl James

text: The future of Indo-Pak cricket will depend on how the peace process goes.
author: Imran Khan

text: I attach the greatest importance to an amplification of the peace efforts in the Middle East. I would also like to see a greater dialogue between the U.S. and the EU.
author: Francois Hollande

text: The United Nations will be at the heart of our international activities. France will assume its full responsibilities at the Security Council by putting its status at the service of peace, respect for human rights and development.
author: Francois Hollande

text: Israel can't make peace without the clear support of the United States.
author: Alan Dershowitz
